forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. North northwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, today unfolds under a tapestry of azure skies, inviting warmth, and gentle breezes. As the sun crowns the day with its golden touch, temperatures hover around a comfortable 63 degrees, gradually nudging down toward 60 in the afternoon’s embrace. The air is fresh, a north-northeast wind whispers softly at about 7 mph, promising a day free from the thick blanket of fog that occasionally drapes this city so dramatically. Tonight, as the sun dips below the horizon, the sky will remain mostly clear, and coolness will settle in, dipping to a refreshing low of about 46 degrees. 

Today’s conditions are quite pleasant, encouraging outdoor explorations. Perhaps a brisk stroll along the waterfront, where the shimmering bay meets the vibrant city skyline, would be in order, or maybe a leisurely afternoon in one of the neighborhood parks, where the simple sound of rustling leaves can be a perfect backdrop to quiet contemplation. With the charming chill of evening approaching, a light jacket would suffice as the sun gives way to twilight. In this stunning winter weather, every observation turns into a moment to savor, beckoning one to step out and absorb the essence of San Francisco.
